attributes.action: re-introduce proper school discipline - we feel that discipline begins at home with the parent/parents however we demand that discipline also be introduced into schools by way of controlled punishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cane didn't harm our generation and some of the current generation would, undoubtedly benefit (as would the general public) from the re-introduction of the cane.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
